code: import{toast}from'react-toastify';import'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css';var notify=function notify(name){return toast.error("".concat(name," is already in contacts!"),{position:'top-right',autoClose:5000,hideProgressBar:false,closeOnClick:true,pauseOnHover:true,draggable:true,progress:undefined});};export default notify;
